keywords: domain names,registry,top-level domain,TLD,ECO,.eco,environmental action,sustainability,ngo,net zero,carbon neutral,green web hosting,climate action

partners.head: Partners
partners.text: We assembled a coalition of over 50 leading environmental non-profit and intergovernmental organizations to advise on the policies for .eco. Some of the organizations behind .eco include:
partners.cta: See the full list of organizations who are part of the .eco coalition.

members.head: Who is using .eco?
members.text: Thousands of leading businesses, non-profits, governments and individuals who care about our planet have chosen a .eco domain for their website.
